column4: what's a good ubuntu10.04 harddisk space, granting i'll install most of the goodies that comes with it via the internet..???

Can you use the entire hard drive or only part of it?
Do the simple method then, set it all as a single partition mounted on /, but leave however much RAM you have to set as swap
It's not necessary to set Ubuntu up with different partitions for /usr/ /tmp/ and so on
